column6: CIVIL WAR TIE-IN!  With Civil War in full-throttle mode, Spider-Man follows his conscience... and fast becomes a lightning rod for controversy.  Unmasked and vunerable, this is Spider-Man as you've NEVER seen him!
column8: | penciller (cover):Ron Garney | writer:Stan Lee | colorist:Matt Milla | letterer:Cory Petit | inker:Bill Reinhold
